text:
Aura Frames (Pushd Inc) | Senior Backend Engineers, iOS Engineers, Front-end Engineers | Seattle, New York, or SF | Full-Time | ONSITE

We build a smart digital picture frame focused on design and usability. This product is designed for families, parents, and grandparents.

iOS Engineers will work on our app, which powers photo selection and configuration of the device. We are passionate about design and usability in our iOS app, and aim to deliver a top-notch mobile app.

Backend engineers will work on our API, as well as connect services for our Data Science team to power deep learning and computer vision applications. We are located in AWS. Our stack is both Rails and Python, with PostgreSQL.

Front-end engineers will work on our website, storefront, and emails.

https://auraframes.com

Series A funding from Spark Capital, other investors include SV Angel, Betaworks, and Data Collective.

Contact us jobs@auraframes.com
